hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions about Alphalens? Want to request a demo or discuss your specific needs? We're here to help you succeed.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your trading needs, questions about features, or demo requirements...

info.title: Contact Information
info.phoneNote: Schedule a call through our contact form
info.officeAddress: 86, 90 Paul St, London EC2A 4NE, United Kingdom

expect.title: What to Expect
expect.demoDescription: We'll schedule a personalized 30-minute demonstration of Alphalens features tailored to your specific trading needs.
expect.inquiriesDescription: Our team will provide detailed answers about features, pricing, integration options, and technical requirements.
expect.partnershipDescription: Interested in white-label solutions or API integration? We'll connect you with our partnership team.

toasts.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields.
toasts.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
toasts.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
toasts.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
